content:
Yes, there are many popular bhajans dedicated to Lord Ganesha that are commonly sung during festivals or temple visits. Below are some of the well-known bhajans that are devoted to Lord Ganesha:

1. "Ganesh Chalisa"
2. "Sukhkarta Dukhharta"
3. "Vakratunda Mahakaya"
4. "Jai Ganesh Deva"
5. "Ganesha Sharanam"
6. "Om Gan Ganpataye Namah"
7. "Ganeshaya Dheemahi"
8. "Morya Re Bappa Morya Re"

These bhajans are often recited with devotion and are believed to invoke Lord Ganesha's blessings and protection. Some of these bhajans can also be found online, with lyrics and music for devotees to sing along with.
